name: oanda-v20-openapi
description: OANDA V20 REST API OpenAPI specification
author: Gergely Rem√©nyi <geri@geriremenyi.com>

scripts.generate:csharp-netcore: yarn validate:bundled && del-cli --force out/code/csharp-netcore && openapi-generator-cli generate -i out/specification/openapi.yaml -g csharp-netcore -o out/code/csharp-netcore -c config/csharp-netcore.json
